mapper.select: select id,totalBeds,rooms from department where totalBeds>0 order by id

select beds.id,beds.deptNo, beds.patientID, beds.status, beds.address, beds.useDate, beds.freeDate, beds.bedNo,beds.roomNo,patient.name as patientName,department.deptName from beds left join patient on beds.patientID=patient.id left join department on beds.deptNo=department.ID where beds.deptNo=#{deptNo} and beds.bedNo=#{bedNo}

select beds.id,beds.deptNo, beds.patientID, beds.status, beds.address, beds.useDate, beds.freeDate, beds.bedNo,beds.roomNo,patient.name as patientName,department.deptName from beds left join patient on beds.patientID=patient.id left join department on beds.deptNo=department.ID
where beds.deptno=#{deptNo}
select id, deptNo, patientID, roomNo, status, bedNo, address from beds where deptNo=#{deptNo} and status =0 order by id
select id, deptNo, patientID, roomNo, status, bedNo, address from beds where deptNo in (select id from department where totalBeds>0 order by borrowLevel desc ) and status =0
mapper.delete: delete from beds where deptNo=#{deptNo} and bedNo = #{bedNo}
delete from beds where bedNo not in (${bedNo})
